channel.title: fracture energy on Wenyao Liu
channel.description: Recent content in fracture energy on Wenyao Liu

item.title: Peridynamics-based simulation of asphalt mixture cracking in semi-circular bending (SCB) test
item.description:
Highlights

  1. Peridynamics model was applied to simulate SCB testing for asphalt mixtures.
  2. Cracking patterns in simulation match lab observations well.
  3. Fracture energy and P-u curve from simulation agrees with experimental results.
  4. Arch effect and energy transformation during SCB testing were investigated.

item.title: Peridynamics-based simulation of asphalt mixture cracking in semi-circular bending (SCB) test
item.description: In this project, peridynamics, a new fracture mechanics methodology that extends classical continuum mechanics to discontinuous material responses, is implemented to simulate crack propagation during the SCB testing process.
